titleStmt.title: The penitent bandito, or, The history of the conversion & death of the most illustrious lord, Signor Troilo Sauelli, a baron of Rome by Sir T.M.
titleStmt.author: Biondi, Giuseppe, 1537-1598.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Blondo by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Errata sheet following contents at end.
Identified as Wing P1232 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) at reel 1428:09.
Imperfect: pages stained with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
